techmeme.title: Sources and docs: Meta has dismantled its system that identified viral hoaxes and limited their reach, and told content-ranking teams to stop penalizing misinfo (Casey Newton/Platformer)
DJI removes its geofence around US "No-Fly Zones", replacing it with a warning, saying the update "aligns" with FAA rules and follows similar changes in the EU (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
In federal court, lawyers for Microsoft and OpenAI defended the scraping of news stories to train LLMs and urged the dismissal of news outlets' copyright claims (Josh Russell/Courthouse News Service)
The SEC sues Elon Musk, claiming he failed to timely disclose a major purchase of Twitter shares ahead of his takeover of the social media platform in 2022 (Nicola M White/Bloomberg)
Huione Guarantee, a Telegram marketplace that facilitates "pig butchering" and other scams, recently launched several crypto products, including a stablecoin (Elliptic)
